description: A podcast for working women hosted by Otegha Uwagba, founder of Women Who and author of modern career guide Little Black Book: A Toolkit for Working Women. Practical advice, fresh ideas, and interviews with smart, successful women – whether you’re just starting out or already have years of experience, you’ll find plenty of inspiration for your working life here.
